tool.name: Tool10

param.name: input_folder
param.dialogReference: Folder containing CSV files to process. Most likely "Intersect_M1M2, Union_M1, Union_M2, or Union_M1M2 folder that contains the compiled R results.

param.name: analysis_type
param.displayname: Analysis Type (IM1M2, UM1, UM2, or UM1M2)
param.dialogReference:
The version of the analysis folder you are inputting. There are only 4 options:

  • IM1M2 = Intersect_M1M2

  • UM1 = Union_M1

  • UM2 = Union_M2

  • UM1M2 = Union_M1M2

tool.summary:
Extracts the year and window from file names and reformats logistic regression results, outputting Excel files for visualization. The tool creates and populates an "Odds_Ratio" and "Significance" folder.

Saves four Excel outputs:

  • Odds Ratio Data (odds_ratio_data.xlsx): Pivoted data on odds ratios by year and window.

  • Significance Data (significance_data.xlsx): Indicates significant values (1 or 0).

  • CI Low Data (ci_low_data.xlsx): Lower bound of confidence intervals (95%).

  • CI Up Data (ci_up_data.xlsx): Upper bound of confidence intervals.
